Youth We Can! (YWC!) began in 2012 as the youth component of Convergences. Its purpose is to promote initiatives and motivate the new generation to act for a fairer and more sustainable world. Within this framework, we organise different events (aperitifs, festivals, evenings, etc.) throughout the year, with the aim of inspiring and informing the youth, especially by highlighting young people who are already active and their supporting structures.

To do so, YWC!’s way of operating is to mobilise various youth organisations to co-construct activities, also contributing to creating and strengthening collective dynamics.
